patthana17.5:4.1: Kusalaṃ savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasavitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.5:4.3: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana17.5:5.1: Kusalaṃ avitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naavitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.5:5.3: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana17.5:6.1: Kusalaṃ avitakkaavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naavitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.5:7.1: Abyākataṃ avitakkaavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naavitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.5:7.4: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
